title: The Adventures of Ling Miller: The Baking Tutor

story.text: Ling Miller discovers a glowing flour sack in her pantry that grants her the power to manipulate dough with her mind.
She tests her newfound abilities by secretly stopping a bakery robbery, shaping dough into barriers and entangling the robbers until the police arrive.
At the tutoring center, Ling uses her abilities subtly to help kids learn math by visualizing problems with sculpted dough figures.
News of the 'Dough Avenger' spreads. Ling feels compelled to use her powers for good, deciding to balance her bakery, tutoring, and newfound hero duties.
Ling thwarts a city hall bombing with her powers, creating a giant dough shield. The community starts to suspect there's a new hero.
Balancing her dual life gets challenging. Ling attends a hero assembly to find support and further instruction from experienced superheroes.
She returns empowered and eager to embrace her role. Ling hosts a baking charity event, secretly using her powers to make extraordinary pastries, raising funds for local schools.

ending: And so, Ling Miller found the perfect recipe for happiness, mixing everyday joy with a pinch of extraordinary.
moral: No hero is too unconventional if they make the world a better place.
